hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
cd /tmp ls -lah DIR=/tmp/doe-task if [ -d "$DIR"]; then echo "repositry exist" else git clone git@github.com:sidbose87/doe-task.git git checkout master && git pull echo "repository created and checked out to latest" fi
echo '#!/bin/bash' > trigger_prereq.sh echo 'if [ -f /etc/os-release ]; then' >> trigger_prereq.sh echo ' . /etc/os-release' >> trigger_prereq.sh echo ' OS=$NAME' >> trigger_prereq.sh echo ' VER=$VERSION_ID' >> trigger_prereq.sh echo 'elif type lsb_release >/dev/null 2>&1; then' >> trigger_prereq.sh echo ' OS=$(lsb_release -si)' >> trigger_prereq.sh echo ' VER=$(lsb_release -sr)' >> trigger_prereq.sh echo 'elif [ -f /etc/lsb-release ]; then' >> trigger_prereq.sh echo ' . /etc/lsb-release' >> trigger_prereq.sh echo ' OS=$DISTRIB_ID' >> trigger_prereq.sh echo ' VER=$DISTRIB_RELEASE' >> trigger_prereq.sh echo 'elif [ -f /etc/debian_version ]; then' >> trigger_prereq.sh echo ' OS=Debian' >> trigger_prereq.sh echo ' VER=$(cat /etc/debian_version)' >> trigger_prereq.sh echo 'elif [ -f /etc/redhat-release ]; then' >> trigger_prereq.sh echo ' OS=RedHat' >> trigger_prereq.sh echo ' VER=$(cat /etc/redhat-release)' >> trigger_prereq.sh echo 'else' >> trigger_prereq.sh echo ' # For all other versions' >> trigger_prereq.sh echo ' OS=$(uname -s)' >> trigger_prereq.sh echo ' VER=$(uname -r)' >> trigger_prereq.sh echo 'fi' >> trigger_prereq.sh
echo 'case $(uname -m) in' >> trigger_prereq.sh echo 'x86_64)' >> trigger_prereq.sh echo ' BITS=64' >> trigger_prereq.sh echo ' ;;' >> trigger_prereq.sh echo 'i*86)' >> trigger_prereq.sh echo ' BITS=32' >> trigger_prereq.sh echo ' ;;' >> trigger_prereq.sh echo '*)' >> trigger_prereq.sh echo ' BITS=?' >> trigger_prereq.sh echo ' ;;' >> trigger_prereq.sh echo 'esac' >> trigger_prereq.sh
echo 'echo "OS, VERSION, BIT-VERSION" > /tmp/details.csv' >> trigger_prereq.sh echo 'echo "$OS, $VER, $BITS" >> /tmp/details.csv' >> trigger_prereq.sh
./trigger_prereq.sh
cat /tmp/details.csv
